attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as the rate which crime is increasing, and the prison population is more or less at maximum.
Then i  would like prisons to made much harsher/tougher places, i.e. not the holiday camps they are today.
In short people sent to prison should serve the full sentance(no early release, at all), remove all tv,radios,gyms,etc. also a return to the hard beds(wooden boards, as mattresses), and simple boring food, hard labour, and genrally make them a true punishment, to put real fear of prison in to criminals.
